channel.title: [525] XX-Scape 100% 25k+ Views! Over 6000+ Downloads! Banking/Pvp Loots!
channel.description:
[size=30pt][b]Hey everyone I edited this server with some custom items and fixed up the PKing a little bit. Enjoy. No Anti-Leach. I Quitted Private Servers.[/b][/size]
[img]http://i27.tinypic.com/fbcfwp.jpg[/img]
Download links [size=18pt]Download Server: http://www.mediafire.com/?nwomzn2lmyj Download Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?xwmazmw21my[/size]
[b]Features[/b] Lunar spells Once you type ::master! [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Master.gif[/img] Vengeance Pvp Drops Bounty hunter Spec delays Skillcapes emote's Lots of mapdata Hp bar fixed Banking works Range Works Statius,Vesta works AND SPECIAL! Dragon claws special! Rune Crossbow! Clan wars (Doe'snt work thought) Mage bank Dragon fireshield special works Give thanks emote working! Food working now! Vesta longsword got a special bar! Wildrness ditch working Edgeville is new home Bone burying All Pvp ARMOUR WORKING EXCEPT STATIUS'S HAMMER
[b]Pictures[/b] New home sweet home [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/homesweethome-4.gif[/img] Banking working!! [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Banking.gif[/img] Inside mage bank [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Magebank-4.gif[/img] Outside Mage Bank [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Outsidemb-1.gif[/img] Inside Bounty Hunter [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Insidebountyhunter.gif[/img] Outside bounty hunter [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Bounterhunter.gif[/img] Hunter kit working [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Hunterkit.gif[/img] Dragon Scimitar special [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Dragonscimitar.gif[/img] Dragon halberd special [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Dragonhalberd.gif[/img] Dragon fire shield special! 100 second's have to wait [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Dragonfireshield-2.gif[/img] Dragon Dagger special [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Dragondagger-1.gif[/img] DRAGON CLAWS! WORKING [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Dragonclaws-7.gif[/img] Barrelchest anchor [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Barrelchestanchor.gif[/img] Bandos godsword special! [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Bandosgodswordspecial-4.gif[/img] Armadyl godsword special [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Armadylgodswordspecial-1.gif[/img] Vesta's longsword special [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/vestaslongswordspecial.gif[/img] Granite maul special [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/granitemaul.gif[/img] Working Dragon mace special [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/dragonmace.gif[/img] Turkey emote working [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Turkeyemote-1.gif[/img] Rune c'bow working (Dragon bolts (e) for the spec and it's no bolts needed!) [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Dragonbolts.gif[/img] Dark bow working [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Darkbow-3.gif[/img] Food working! [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Foodworking.gif[/img] Bone Burying working! [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Boneburying.gif[/img] Teleport gfx + Anim working! [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Gfx.gif[/img] Whip Special! [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/whipspecial.gif[/img] Zamorak godsword special [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Zamorakgodswordspecial-7.gif[/img] Working Vengeance [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Vengeance-4.gif[/img] Special Bars Working [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Specialbars.gif[/img] Sara Sword Special! [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Saradominswordspecial.gif[/img] Sara Godsword Special! [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Saradomingodswordspecial-2.gif[/img] [b]Pvp Drops Working Randomised!![/b] [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m456/mudd09/Pvploots.gif[/img] Outside mage bank
[size=18pt]Download Server: http://www.mediafire.com/?nwomzn2lmyj Download Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?xwmazmw21my[/size]
